thread.title: Photos is getting Chromecast support this week on Android and ‘very soon’ on iOS
thread.title_full: Google Photos is getting Chromecast support this week on Android and ‘very soon’ on iOS - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Photos is getting Chromecast support this week on Android and ‘very soon’ on iOS
text: At its Nexus event today, Google announced Chromecast support is coming to Google Photos. The feature is rolling out this week on Android , and “very soon” on iOS. It’s important to remember that Chromecast support already existed in Google+ Photos. When Google Photos succeeded Google+ Photos, however, the feature was also lost. But that’s not […] »
